Overthere - 'The One Key'


Serendipity - (n). A natural gift for making discoveries by accident

It happened at least twice, here - once when the original poster came across the key, and once when I came across the post... the ONLY mention of this object on any of the 10 or so sites I regularly check.

What the heck am I talking about, you ask? I am talking about 'The One Key', a little mystery item found by a player on top of one of the plateaus in scorpikis canyon in the Overthere. To read the post, go here. Our lucky day though, it turns out -- Plutarch (60 wizard, Bristlebane) read this post and set out to find it, and he found it indeed. The location of the key is on a plateau at neg212, neg378.

Directions: If you zone into Overthere from Skyfire, head STRAIGHT out from the zone and you'll hit the scorpikis canyon. Follow the edge to the right, past the temple with the two named scorpions at neg1400, neg1400. Continue following the right edge til around the first 'ramp'. Look down at neg100, neg480 and you'll see the plateau below. On it is a small bag that looks like druid droppings; this is the key.

An ID of the key provided no further information, as it IDs as Lore Item: The One Key. So what is this for?

UPDATE: As interesting as this could have been, it turns out this is merely an item for the enchanter epic weapon quest (details here). The key is just given to an npc to further the quest, and has no other apparent uses. Keep exploring though, and thanks to Jherek Spiritreaver of Tarew Marr for solving the mystery!




Page updated: 02/08/01
